statements: SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE grade > 4.5;
SELECT id, student_id, feedback_text FROM feedback WHERE instructor_id = 101;
SELECT instructor_id, student_id, grade FROM feedback WHERE grade < 3.0;
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE student_id = 201 AND instructor_id = 101;
SELECT id, feedback_text FROM feedback WHERE student_id = 301;
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE grade > 4.5 ORDER BY grade DESC, student_id ASC
SELECT student_id, MAX(grade) FROM feedback GROUP BY student_id ORDER BY student_id ASC
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE instructor_id = 101 OR instructor_id = 102 AND grade < 4 ORDER BY student_id DESC
SELECT student_id, instructor_id, COUNT(*) AS total_feedback FROM feedback GROUP BY student_id, instructor_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY total_feedback DESC
SELECT student_id, AVG(grade) AS avg_grade FROM feedback GROUP BY student_id HAVING avg_grade > 3 ORDER BY avg_grade DESC
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM Students;
SELECT * FROM Feedback WHERE grade > 80;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT feedback_text, grade FROM Feedback ORDER BY grade DESC;
SELECT * FROM Students JOIN Feedback ON Students.student_id = Feedback.student_id;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Students ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM Students WHERE student_id BETWEEN 2 AND 5;
SELECT student_name, grade FROM Students JOIN Feedback ON Students.student_id = Feedback.student_id WHERE grade > 90;
SELECT student_name, feedback_text FROM Students JOIN Feedback ON Students.student_id = Feedback.student_id WHERE instructor_id = 3 AND grade < 70;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, student_id FROM Students WHERE student_id = 100;
SELECT instructor_name, instructor_id FROM Instructors WHERE instructor_id < 5;
SELECT feedback_text, grade FROM Feedback WHERE student_id = 200 AND grade >= 90;
SELECT * FROM Feedback ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1
SELECT student_name FROM Students ORDER BY student_id DESC
SELECT instructor_name, feedback_text FROM Instructors INNER JOIN Feedback ON Instructors.instructor_id = Feedback.instructor_id
SELECT student_name, grade FROM Students LEFT JOIN Feedback ON Students.student_id = Feedback.student_id WHERE grade > 90
SELECT COUNT(*) AS num_students, AVG(grade) AS avg_grade FROM Students LEFT JOIN Feedback ON Students.student_id = Feedback.student_id
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name FROM Students WHERE student_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM Feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT instructor_name, email FROM Instructors ORDER BY instructor_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, email FROM Students WHERE student_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM Instructors WHERE instructor_id = 3 ORDER BY instructor_name DESC;
SELECT student_id, feedback_text FROM Feedback WHERE instructor_id = 4 AND feedback_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY feedback_date ASC;
SELECT student_name, grade FROM Students JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id WHERE grade > 80 ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, course_code FROM courses WHERE course_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT instructor_name, COUNT(course_id) AS total_courses FROM courses GROUP BY instructor_id;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM students WHERE student_id < 5 ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT course_name, course_code, instructors.instructor_name FROM courses JOIN instructors ON courses.instructor_id = instructors.instructor_id;
SELECT student_name, instructor_name, feedback_text FROM students JOIN feedback ON students.student_id = feedback.student_id JOIN instructors ON feedback.instructor_id = instructors.instructor_id;
SELECT AVG(grade) AS avg_grade, COUNT(*) AS num_students FROM grades GROUP BY course_id HAVING avg_grade >= 80;
